body: Well it's been a good run on this server. It's time for me to move on. You will see me always on AU Kohi but not on Avicus anymore. I haven't really been playing much and I am losing interest. I don't know if it's considered spam,( this post).  I will be thanking people over Skype for their contribution to me on avicus. BALLZI out.

replies.body:
Goodbye, I didn't know you all that well, but I'll leave you with some wise words :)

Life is like a roller coaster. You can't always see what's around the bend, but you meet it head on, and face it. Everything in life happens for a reason. Sometimes, the roller coaster stays on one track, either downhill or uphill. It's up to you to shift and shape it.

Enjoy the wild ride it is. :)
-FrozenSolstice 2015, What I've learned.
